channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @languagejones Happy to risk one “very sleepy” in exchange for two “somewhat sleepys”
item.source:markdown: @languagejones Happy to risk one “very sleepy” in exchange for two “somewhat sleepys”

item.description: @WaywardWinifred Cheaper than hiring guards with funny hats.
item.source:markdown: @WaywardWinifred Cheaper than hiring guards with funny hats.

item.description:
@greg_shill The lines between being old, adamant, and an unapologetic asshole are exceedingly thin.

@greg_shill As someone who tends toward being adamant and is growing ever older, this is a cautionary tale.
item.source:markdown:
@greg_shill The lines between being old, adamant, and an unapologetic asshole are exceedingly thin.
@greg_shill As someone who tends toward being adamant and is growing ever older, this is a cautionary tale.

item.description: Easy to get at your local CVS. Can be combined with other vaccine such as covid or flu. Two doses. Highly recommend. https://t.co/AdEAgYPVLy
item.source:markdown: Easy to get at your local CVS. Can be combined with other vaccine such as covid or flu. Two doses. Highly recommend. https://t.co/AdEAgYPVLy

item.description: As a 9/11’s worth of Americans continue to die from covid each week, a look at the depraved ideological forces that made surrender to the virus the “sensible” policy choice. https://t.co/5AX4QAYPqh
item.source:markdown: As a 9/11’s worth of Americans continue to die from covid each week, a look at the depraved ideological forces that made surrender to the virus the “sensible” policy choice. https://t.co/5AX4QAYPqh

item.description: @kampeas @nytimes I know at one point their articles were reprinted and translated by הארץ.

item.description: @EladNehorai “Foreign, different, and inhumane” — oh, how Hasidim explain those of us outside their cults to their children.
item.source:markdown: @EladNehorai “Foreign, different, and inhumane” — oh, how Hasidim explain those of us outside their cults to their children.

item.description: @abbaleh @safier @DemocraticLuntz @avitalrachel Also plausible that there aren’t more than a handful of modern orthodox schools left in NY and that the growth has all been in NJ.

item.description: @katem02134 @hannahgais Everyone in Obama’s cabinet got one. Some kept theirs; some passed it to family members.

item.description: @HannahLebovits These are my people! Say hi to my grandfather and his radical sister-in-law, my Great Aunt “Red” Josephine Heyman.
item.source:markdown: @HannahLebovits These are my people! Say hi to my grandfather and his radical sister-in-law, my Great Aunt “Red” Josephine Heyman.

item.description: @trekonomics When monarchies are criminalized, only criminals have the crown.

item.description: @trekonomics Small price to pay for an additional nuclear umbrella.

item.description: @scalzi “Stupidest possibility” argues for being a dimwit. As does the fact that if he just wanted to sell the secrets he could have taken photos and returned the files upon request.
item.source:markdown: @scalzi “Stupidest possibility” argues for being a dimwit. As does the fact that if he just wanted to sell the secrets he could have taken photos and returned the files upon request.
